signature: String text(int, int, boolean, boolean, boolean)

enhanced_by.reason: Both methods require specifying a length for the generated text.
Both methods involve generating text with optional inclusion of digits.
Both methods involve specifying a range for the length of the generated text.
The target method relies on the configuration built by TextRuleConfig to generate the text.
The target method may delegate to this method if the number of different symbols is less than or equal to 256.
